============
Unit Tests
============

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2


Run unit test
-------------


  It is recommended to run the unit tests after installation by:

1- **Extract test data**::

  tar -xvf MSM_PELE/test/data.tar.gz

2- **Run test**::

  cd /path/where/you/want/to/runTheTest/from/

  sbatch MSM_PEE/test/test.sl
